msbt.message: Hey, , could you show me the other rooms, please?
Is that—do you have a secret room over there?!
Your house is so laid-back. Like there's a place for everything but there's nothing in its place!
The<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> ?<20_3 arg="6" /> <20_3 arg="3" />Why is it facing the wall?Are you watching paint dry? That sounds like a cool hobby. I've just never had the patience for it.
Wow! This is amaaaaaazing! I TOTES respect folks who can live with just a few things.I tried the whole minimalist-living thing once, but the acoustics were terrible.
Your place is so nice. You've got ALL the things you need to be très cozy.I did the minimalist thing for a while, but cozy is WAY better than sleeping on the floor so your place looks cool.
You're not putting anything on your walls?! Well, that gives spiders fewer places to hide, huh?
This room is FULL of rare items! Are you, like, a treasure hunter?!
You've got totes excellent furniture. I'm no expert, but if I had to narrow it down to a genre, I'd say it'sle trend-o très chic, MEGA bonkers!<10_4 /> I wish I owned stuff even HALF this cool, .
This place is super empty! Is that your thing, ? InnnnterestingMy house is full of all sorts of stuff. Maybe I could learn a thing or two from you!
This room is so full of furniture How do you even move in here?
It's trueyou can tell a lot about someone by looking at their house.
It's super fun to visit folks' housessee the furniturelearn the layoutYou get SO MANY interior-design ideas that way!
Ha! This place just SCREAMS ""!Everyone's house really seems to match their personality. I wonder if my place matches mine?
